title: [K-12] Transformative Learning Assessment-Based MOOC Design for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Bachelor’s degree in nursing or at least five years of clinical experience
context.additional_context: Need to establish a project-based assessment system optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate reflective levels of at least three stages among Mezirow’s seven stages of transformative learning in project deliverables

After analyzing three nursing field cases (patient mobility assistance, infection control, wound care) via PBL, learners select one case per team and create either a 5-minute role-play or A3 poster including a three-step or more practical procedure, achieving an "Excellent" grade in at least two of the three evaluation rubric items (clarity, creativity, practicality).
Using peer assessment rubrics, learners identify transformative learning elements in peers’ project deliverables with 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
